alias.description: User-defined identifier, often a short name, of this annotation.

criteria.description: Criteria used to produce the annotation.

inspiredBy.description: Link to (source) image(s) that inspired the definition of this annotation.

laterality.description: The side of the body or bilateral organ that this annotation is defined in.

namingTerm.description: Anatomical entity (anatomical term) that names the here specified annotation.

relatedAtlasTerm.description: Anatomical entity (term) of a brain atlas annotation to which the here specified annotation is related to.

visualizedIn.description: Link to visualization parameters of this annotation.
